11.title: Those Who Boost Each Other Up
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Asta and Yuno
1.plot: Introduction of Asta and Yuno and magical world of Black Clover. Asta struggles to awaken his magic while Yuno achieves glory.

2.title: The Boys' Promise
2.plot: The grimoire that Yuno received was a legendary grimoire with a four-leaf clover. A bandit named Revchi comes to steal it, and Asta comes to Yuno's rescue.

3.title: To the Royal Capital of the Clover Kingdom
3.plot: Asta and Yuno set out on their journey to the far-distant royal capital of the Clover Kingdom to take the Magic Knights Entrance Exam. Yes, Asta, too.

4.title: The Magic Knights Entrance Exam
4.plot: Joining the Magic Knights is the first step on Asta's and Yuno's path to becoming the Wizard King. But does the magicless Asta even stand a chance?

5.title: The Path to the Wizard King
5.plot: The grueling exam is over, and the Magic Knight captains choose the most promising examinees to join their squads. At least Yuno has what it takes...

6.title: The Black Bulls
6.plot: Asta must complete a crazy hazing ritual of sorts before he's officially accepted into the ragtag Black Bulls squad. Yuno meets with the Golden Dawn.

7.title: The Other New Recruit
7.plot: Magna gives Asta a whirlwind tour of the Black Bulls' weird and wonderful hideout, including an introduction to the other newest member of the squad.

8.title: Go! Go! First Mission
8.plot: Asta is sent on his first mission to fight off boars with the others.

9.title: Beast
9.plot: Something's not right in Saussy Village: it's enveloped in a magic mist obscuring the nefarious goings-on within. Asta, Noelle, and Magna investigate.

10.title: Those Who Protect
10.plot: After Asta, Ragna and Noe go beyond their limitations they finally defeat the bandits.

11.title: What Happened on a Certain Day in the Castle Town
11.plot: After returning from there first mission, the Black Bulls recieve their first gold star.

12.title: The Wizard King Saw
12.plot: All eyes are on Asta as he and Sekke race to capture a purse-snatcher. Meanwhile, Yuno's first Golden Dawn mission takes him to an unexpected place.

13.title: The Wizard King Saw, Continued
13.plot: Yuno never expected his last-minute detour to involve such tragedy. It's up to the Golden Dawn to get to the bottom of their mission's many mysteries.

14.title: Dungeon
14.plot: Asta and Noelle are charged with exploring a newly discovered dungeon full of magical traps. Their leader, the battle-mad Luck, is less than helpful.

15.title: The Diamond Mage
15.plot: Suddenly the dungeon is host to several teams racing through traps to the treasure waiting in its depths--including a noted mage from an enemy nation.

16.title: Friends
16.plot: Asta, Yuno, and their squadmates must take on daunting foes on their way to the heart of the dungeon, but Luck remains dead set on fighting all alone.

17.title: Destroyer
17.plot: The Diamond Kingdom's secret weapon wields more powerful magic than anyone has seen. The Golden Dawn team is all but decimated. Can he be defeated?

18.title: Memories of You
18.plot: The Clover Kingdom's Magic Knights reach the dungeon's treasure hall, but another daunting battle keeps them from reveling in their victory for long.

19.title: Destruction and Salvation
19.plot: The dungeon itself turns against the Magic Knights as they fight to escape--and to keep a badly wounded Asta alive. Mars remembers how he came to be.

20.title: Assembly at the Royal Capital
20.plot: Asta and Noelle visit the royal capital to report on the dungeon mission, but get roped into something else entirely with their Golden Dawn friends.

21.title: Capital Riot
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: Wild Magic Dance
22.plot: The best of the Magic Knights--plus Asta and Noelle--fight the hordes of undead beseiging the royal capital. Noelle suffers a crisis of confidence.

23.title: The Crimson Lion King
23.plot: The capital is attacked and it's up to the Royal Guard to stop them.

24.title: Blackout
24.plot: Rades wasn't the only invader--and the others are more powerful, their sights set far higher. The Magic Knights fall victim to a Spatial Magic spell.

25.title: Adversity
25.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

26.title: Wounded Beasts
26.plot: The masterminds behind the invasion reveal themselves, though their motivation remains unclear. Asta spends quality time with one of his heroes.

27.title: Light
27.plot: The Wizard King, Julius, displays his power against enemies, and rescues Asta in the process.

28.title: The One I've Set My Heart On
28.plot: After some debate as to who to ask, Finral invites Luck and Asta to join him for a Mixer with 3 lovely ladies, to become more acquainted. Meanwhile, Noelle follows them to the tavern and gets a job as a worker just to spy on them.

29.title: Path
29.plot: Old friends and fellow squad members reminisce about Asta: his humble beginnings, his craziest battles--and underlying it all, his burning ambition.

30.title: The Mirror Mage
30.plot: The Black Bulls get a day off, which Gauche spends visiting his beloved sister Marie. Then a mysterious tragedy befalls the village--is Marie safe?

31.title: Pursuit over the Snow
31.plot: Asta and Gauche scour the countryside in search of Nean's children, who have fallen into the clutches of a ruthless monster thirsty for their magic.

32.title: Three-Leaf Sprouts
32.plot: As expected, there were bigger baddies behind the abduction of Nean's children. Luckily Sister Theresa is on hand to join the fight for their freedom.

33.title: To Help Somebody Someday
33.plot: Gauche reflects on his past as he struggles with protecting Marie versus helping Asta in his downhill battle against Sally's mutant magic monster.

34.title: Light Magic vs Dark Magic
34.plot: Backup arrives for Asta's showdown against the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun. Asta must push past his limits to pull off a tricky technique.

35.title: The Light of Judgment
35.plot: The Black Bulls seem to be on the losing end of an epic clash between two highly gifted magic users. Gauche has an idea that could turn the tables.

36.title: Three Eyes
36.plot: Three elite members of the Eye of the Midnight Sun pay a visit to their comrade Licht, prepared to make Yami and friends pay for what they've done.

37.title: The One with No Magic
37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: The Magic Knights Captain Conference
38.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

39.title: Three-Leaf Salute
39.plot: There's a traitor among the captains! Marx's spell reveals who's been collaborating with the Eye of the Midnight Sun. Julius considers his next move.

40.title: A Black Beach Story
40.plot: The Black Bulls relax at the beach as they gear up for their secret mission. Noelle's showing off her new swimsuit--if Asta would pay any attention.

41.title: The Water Girl Grows Up
41.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

42.title: The Underwater Temple
42.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

43.title: Temple Battle Royale
43.plot: It's the misfit magicians of the Black Bulls up against the fearsome fish-masked Temple Mages. Noelle faces a surprising foe, and Asta uses his head.

44.title: The Pointlessly Direct Fireball and the Wild Lightning
44.plot: Vetto and his minions come to the Underwater Temple.

45.title: The Guy Who Doesn't Know When to Quit
45.plot: Asta and Kiato rush to help their allies when Vetto overwhelms Magna, Luck and Gio.

46.title: Awakening
46.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

47.title: The Only Weapon
47.plot: Vanessa and Finral find inspiration as a tattered remnant of Black Bulls bands together to tackle the mighty Vetto--who shows no sign of slowing down.

48.title: Despair vs. Hope
48.plot: Finral and Vanessa reflect on their pasts while guiding Asta's attacks, but they'll need to change it up to keep the furry fiend Vetto on his toes.

49.title: Beyond Limits
49.plot: Asta's never-give-up attitude has a impact on his fellow Black Bulls. Vetto recalls his youth, while Yami comes to a realization and takes action.

50.title: End of the Battle, End of Despair
50.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

51.title: Proof of Rightness
51.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

52.title: Whoever's Strongest Wins
52.plot: Yuno and the Golden Dawn take point in Kiten, while the Black Bulls' contingent tend to the survivors. Yami has a little chat with William Vangeance.

53.title: Behind the Mask
53.plot:

54.title: Never Again
54.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

55.title: The Man Named Fanzell
55.plot: A flashback to Asta's days learning the sword under a skilled mage with a complicated past--and a dangerous future. Noelle hopes he can help Asta now.

56.title: The Man Named Fanzell Continued
56.plot: Fanzell meets Asta again once Asta's joined the Black Bulls, but this time he's far from alone. In the present, Vanessa seeks a cure for Asta's curse.

57.title: Infiltration

58.title: Battlefield Decision

59.title: Flames of Hatred
59.plot: Together, Asta and friends must find a way to extinguish the flames of Fana's deep-seated hatred--and the literal flames of her fire spirit familiar.

60.title: Defectors Atonement

imdb.plot outline: Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, latrine as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover". Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal.
imdb.title: Black Clover
plot: Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, latrine as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover". Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal.
